original: Eriksson, Frank Arne Vilhelm, redaktör, Uddevalla, f. 4/3/03’ i Uddevalla, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. _ G. 28 m. Ruth Johnsson. Barn: Åje f. 32, Rey 36. — Medarb. i Kuriren fr. 24, huv:red. o. ansv. utg. fr. 45. Ordf. i brandstyr. o. polisnd, v. ordf. i Boh.-Hali. erk. centr :sjukkassa.
translated: Eriksson, Frank Arne Vilhelm, editor, from Uddevalla, born on March 4th, 1903 in Uddevalla, Gothenburg and Bohuslän. Married in 1928 to Ruth Johnsson, with two children: Åje born in 1932 and Rey born in 1936. Worked as a collaborator for Kuriren since 1924, becoming chief editor and responsible for publishing in 1945. Chairman of the fire and police department, vice chairman of the Bohus-Halland recognized center health insurance.
